message:
This 8 year old little girl has endured more than any human should ever have to endure. Thanks to Hope for Justice she can begin her journey of healing. 
#HelpERASE

data.description:
Our Cambodia team has a new arrival at the Lighthouse today: an eight-year-old girl just rescued from sex trafficking. So difficult to hear about this, and what she's been through. But today we can at least celebrate her freedom – and begin the process of restoration and healing.

Find out more about the Lighthouse and our other projects at www.hopeforjustice.org/cambodia

(Library image, to protect the survivor's identity)
data.title: Timeline Photos
